current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit the use of funds for United States
		  participation in joint military exercises with Egypt if the Government of Egypt
		  abrogates, terminates, or withdraws from the 1979 Egypt-Israel peace treaty.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Conditioning United States-Egypt
			 Military Exercises Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Contingent limitation
			 on availability of funds for United States participation in joint military
			 exercises with Egypt

text.#text:
No amounts appropriated or otherwise made
			 available for the United States Government may be used for United States
			 participation in joint military exercises with Egypt if the Government of Egypt
			 abrogates, terminates, or withdraws from the 1979 Egypt-Israel peace treaty
			 signed at Washington, DC, on March 26, 1979.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Conditioning United States-Egypt Military Exercises Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
in writing that the waiver is in the national security interests of
			 the United States.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S984 IS: Conditioning United States-Egypt Military Exercises Act of 2013
